title: Leading European city tourism destinations in 2018 , by number of bednights
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing European City Destination, and Number of bednights in millions in each European City Destination on the y axis.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.
There is a difference of 60.4 between the maximum European City Destination London and minimum European City Destination Lisbon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing European City Destination, and Number of bednights in millions in each European City Destination on the y axis.
The maximum Number of bednights in millions 71.16 is found at European City Destination London and the minimum is found at Lisbon where European City Destination is 10.76.
There is a difference of 60.4 between the maximum European City Destination London and minimum European City Destination Lisbon.
max_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing European City Destination, and Number of bednights in millions in each European City Destination on the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
There is a difference of 60.4 between the maximum European City Destination London and minimum European City Destination Lisbon.

European City Destination London is higher than any other European City Destinations with value 71.16, followed by Paris, and Berlin. Down to European City Destination Lisbon with the lowest value 10.76.
The average Number of bednights in millions in all 15 European City Destinations is 24.47.
